name: ai-smart-document-assistant-frontend
description: Frontend for AI Smart Document Assistant

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp -r pages css js assets public/ 2>/dev/null || (echo 'Copying static files...' && xcopy pages public\pages /E /I /Y && xcopy css public\css /E /I /Y && xcopy js public\js /E /I /Y && xcopy assets public\assets /E /I /Y)
